art.author: joanne
art.post: My mom, niece and myself loved Heaven is for Real.  I looked up Akiane Kramarik on the internet and found her artwork and poetry – there is a picture of Mary that is just beautiful, Jane!  Check it out.  I’ll be praying for you and hope to see you in Heaven!  I think we’ll both like it!
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
